product_name: EucerinRadiant Tone Eye Cream Dark Circle Corrector
summary: SummaryEucerin Radiant Tone Eye Cream Dark Circle Corrector instantly brightens and helps visibly correct the look of dark circles over time with regular use.
details: DetailsBenefitsHelps visibly correct the look of dark circles over time with regular useCool-feeling metal applicator helps reduce the look of puffiness and eyes bagsFeaturesLightweight, non-sticky dark circle corrector eye creamBrightening eye cream suitable for all skin types, even sensitive skinKey IngredientsFormula with Thiamidol helps correct the look of dark circles in the eye areaIncludes light-reflecting pigments to instantly brighten the eye areaItem 2634618How To UseGently apply Eucerin Radiant Tone Eye Cream Dark Circle Corrector to the under eye area. Limit the collective use of Radiant Tone skincare products to four times daily.Precautions: Keep out of reach of children. For external use only. Avoid contact with eyes. Discontinue use if irritation occurs.IngredientsWater, Glycerin, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Alcohol Denat., Cocoglycerides, Cetearyl Alcohol, Isopropyl Palmitate, Cetyl Palmitate, Glyceryl Stearate, Diisopropyl Adipate, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Lauroyl Lysine, SodiumHyaluronate, Glycyrrhiza Inflata Root Extract, Pimpinella Anisum (Anise) Fruit Extract, Isobutylamido Thiazolyl Resorcinol, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, SodiumStearoyl Glutamate, Citric Acid, Xanthan Gum, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, SodiumHydroxide, Trisodium EDTA, Titanium Dioxide, Tin Oxide, Iron Oxides.
how_to_use: Gently apply Eucerin Radiant Tone Eye Cream Dark Circle Corrector to the under eye area. Limit the collective use of Radiant Tone skincare products to four times daily.Precautions: Keep out of reach of children. For external use only. Avoid contact with eyes. Discontinue use if irritation occurs.

reviews.headline: Unsure
reviews.comments: I don't have crazy dark circles but I decided to give this a try. With just two weeks of use, I did not see any progress. But I have noticed that I started to get milia around my eyes. I have since stopped using it.

reviews.headline: Great product!
reviews.comments: I have really dark circles and dry skin under my eyes. This is one of the few products that takes care of both. Lots of other products bother my eyes. This one does not.

reviews.headline: Eucerin Eye Cream
reviews.comments: This works for all around the eye area and fades the Dark circles. It takes few weeks to see results but it works .

reviews.headline: Pros outweighs the cons!!
reviews.comments: As a girly with hereditary dark circles, this does wonders!!! I've seen such a difference overtime. I've used so many dark circle eye creams and none of them compare to this. It pills if you put too much but honestly I deal with the pilling and reapply because it's just that good.

reviews.headline: It works!
reviews.comments: I have only been using the product for 2 weeks, but i have already noticed an improvement. I suffer from dark under eyes and no concealer ive found has covered them up fully. So i thought id try this corrector since the reviews were positive. Im very pleased with how my undereyes look since using this. The only concern i have was that the first fee times i used it, it burned a little. But now it doesnt. Ill update my review with pics once i use it a little longer!

reviews.headline: Too expensive and didn't have anything special
reviews.comments: So I returned it - most probably I won't buy it again

reviews.headline: extremely prone to pilling
reviews.comments: I wanted to love this because it feels nice going on, is gently illuminating, and most importantly doesn't burn like so many illuminating undereye creams. unfortunately it is very prone to pilling. it was extremely incompatable with the sunscreen I was using when I first got it, and did improve when I went back to my favorite sunscreen but still pills up a bit throughout the day if I wipe or rub the area around the eye at all. I decided not to return it because I otherwise do enjoy using it, but will not be repurchasing and wouldn't reccommend it to others.

reviews.headline: It pills throughout the day
reviews.comments: I really wanted to love this as I was searching for something to replace the discontinued Hope in a Tube. While it was somewhat moisturizing and somewhat "illuminating" it "pills" when you touch it rind the area where it was applied.

reviews.headline: Literally buying another one now
reviews.comments: I received a tube of this on Pinch me in exchange for review, but I lost my first tube and I'm buying another one right now because I loved it so much. This is my honest review. At night I put a fairly thick layer under my eyes and after about half an hour it's already absorbed into the skin. I do the same in the morning but less thick During my morning prep routine. It has made a world of a difference honestly. It's my first eye treatment experience and I was amazed by results within a day. So many of the free trial reviews are fake positive but seriously it works for me so well.

faceoff_positive.comments:
I recently started using the Eucerin Radiant Tone Eye Cream, and I'm genuinely impressed with the results! The cream has a lightweight, non-greasy texture that absorbs quickly into the skin, making it perfect for both morning and nighttime use.
After just a few weeks of consistent application, I noticed a visible reduction in the appearance of my dark circles. The area around my eyes looks brighter and more even-toned, which has really boosted my confidence. I also appreciate how hydrating the formula isâ€”it doesn't just sit on the skin but actually feels like it's nourishing and smoothing the delicate under-eye area.
One of the things I love most about this eye cream is that it doesn't cause any irritation or heaviness, which I've experienced with other products in the past. It's gentle yet effective, and I've had no issues using it daily. Plus, a little goes a long way, so the tube lasts quite a while.
faceoff_positive.headline: Great product

faceoff_negative.comments: I wanted to love this because it feels nice going on, is gently illuminating, and most importantly doesn't burn like so many illuminating undereye creams. unfortunately it is very prone to pilling. it was extremely incompatable with the sunscreen I was using when I first got it, and did improve when I went back to my favorite sunscreen but still pills up a bit throughout the day if I wipe or rub the area around the eye at all. I decided not to return it because I otherwise do enjoy using it, but will not be repurchasing and wouldn't reccommend it to others.
faceoff_negative.headline: extremely prone to pilling

rollup.name: Radiant Tone Eye Cream Dark Circle Corrector
